meta.title: Diman Regional Voc-Tech / Serving Fall River, Somerset, Swansea, and Westport

meta.name: description
meta.content: A regional vocational-technical high school located in southeastern Massachusetts. Our 18 vocational technical programs have over 1,400 students enrolled in grades 9 through 12.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Diman Regional, Diman Voc-Tech, Fall River, Westport, Somerset, Swansea, Vocational High School
Diman Regional Voc-Tech / Serving Fall River, Somerset, Swansea, and Westport
A regional vocational-technical high school located in southeastern Massachusetts. Our 18 vocational technical programs have over 1,400 students enrolled in grades 9 through 12.

Diman Regional Voc-Tech / Serving Fall River, Somerset, Swansea, and Westport
A regional vocational-technical high school located in southeastern Massachusetts. Our 18 vocational technical programs have over 1,400 students enrolled in grades 9 through 12.

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Thanks for donating blood

a.span: Diman producing face shields to protect health care workers against coronavirus

div.p: Diman Regional Vocational Technical School is putting its technology to use to help protect health care workers from the coronavirus. (3/30/20)

a.title: Go to comments for Diman producing face shields to protect health care workers against coronavirus

a.span: Diman donating medical supplies to area hospitals, first responders

div.p: To assist medical professionals as they respond to the COVID-19 pandemic, Diman Regional Vocational Technical High School announced that it is donating hundreds of medical supplies normally used for vocational education training to all area hospitals, first responders and police and fire departments. (3/24/20)

a.title: Go to comments for Diman donating medical supplies to area hospitals, first responders

div.p: In recent days, you have likely heard the escalating reports connected to the Coronavirus (COVID-19) in Massachusetts and Rhode Island. Effective March 3, 2020, Diman Regional has started a precautionary protocol associated with the cleanliness of our building. Custodial staff members are working to keep all solid surfaces clean and disinfected. (3/4/20)

a.title: Go to comments for Coronavirus Update

div.p: Diman is thrilled to announce that our students won 57 medals at the SkillsUSA District 2 Competition, held on 2/27/20 at Southeastern Voc-Tech. Diman students earned 23 gold, 17 silver, and 16 bronze medals. (2/28/20)

a.title: Go to comments for SkillsUSA District Success

a.span: Back from a national competition, Diman cheerleading right back to work

div.p: The Florida tans may be just about faded when the Diman Regional High School cheerleading team takes the mat for the league and state vocational championships on Feb. 23, but the major-competition experience isn’t going anywhere. (2/25/20)

a.title: Go to comments for Back from a national competition, Diman cheerleading right back to work

img.title: Thanks for donating blood

div.span: The Greater Fall River Vocational School District, Diman Regional Vocational Technical High School, does not discriminate on the bases of race, religion, color, sex (including pregnancy, gender identity, and sexual orientation), parental status, national origin, age, disability, family medical history or genetic information, political affiliation, military service, or other non-merit based factors.
